title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Competencies: Bridging Academic Achievement Gaps through AP Mathematics Program Expansion

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Fundamental Middle School Mathematics Concepts
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Students can explain and apply at least three foundational problem-solving strategies for AP Mathematics.
Students achieve over 80% participation in collaborative learning projects using smartphone-based learning tools.
Students submit project outcomes that meet or exceed 70% of the AP Mathematics standard assessment criteria in weekly evaluations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
